input.sentences: i photographed portraits of the gay couples in my hometown . the first couple was a bi-racial couple who had been together for 5 yers .
the next was a sweet couple who had been together for 12 years .
the next couple told me about how one of them use to be a cop .
the met on the job and they 've been together ever since .
the last couple was a bit more unusual . one of them loved to dress in drag . i learned a lot while doing this project and i hope to learn more in the future .
output.sentences: For years he had been taking portraits of interracial couples.
He also remembered this sweet gay couple that gave him a dozen roses.
They would joke that he looked like a cop and would never find anyone.
But he had met someone at his previous job.
They had worked together at an unusual photography project and fallen in love.
